channel.title: Dark-arch [508]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2yoei37.jpg[/img]
[CENTER]Hey guys i started this project about 2 days ago and i wanted to release v1 to rune-server.
This is my first server and i think i did a pretty good job on it considering it's a 508.
MY goal for this project is to make a good all around server.
[B]server base : unarmed pvp[/B][/CENTER]
[B]~~~~~~~~Features~~~~~~~~~~~[/B] Deleted all npc's that unarmed pvp had becasue i want to make my own npcs. 5 tutor's made were tutor's tell you about how to train skills they teach and give u starting items. New home made it were you have to pray at altar's to change magic's. Toke all commands away that gave item's and level's. added ::home command. added informational guide. added prayer altar so u can recharge prayer points. added a training tunnel for low levels ( about 70% done). added hair dresser so u can change you change your hair. added objects like more trees around woodcutting tutor. added objects like ore around mining tutor. around 70 npc's all together right now
[B]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~update's to come~~~~~~~~~~~~~~.[/B] Starter. better combat system. more skills. more training place's. more npc's
[B][CENTER][SIZE="3"]~~~~~~~~Videos~~~~~~~~~~~~[/SIZE][/CENTER][/B] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5FC5idF6NMo"]Magic changing video[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cvI-8gTZhr0"]Tutor's and informational guide and hair dresser[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2g-QH9HdOYs"]Magic guide and training tunnel.[/URL]
[COLOR="Red"]Guys don't flame please this is my first server and i know i didn't do a lot but at least im trying to make everything my own[/COLOR]
Download link --->[url=http://uppit.com/v/WH73443J]http://uppit.com/v/WH73443J[/url][/CENTER]

item.title: Dark-arch [508]
item.dc:creator: @CodyPkz1337 CodyPkz1337
item.description:
@CodyPkz1337 wrote:

CODYPKZ FOR LIFE4

Features

PVP based on different height levels ( Upstairs / downstairs )

100% Banking

Full PVP armour with degrading, specials, and corrupt sets.

Miasmic barrage with working effects.

90% Clanchat.

100% Mage Bank

90% Bounty hunter

100% Normal magic’s ( YEP )

100% Ancient magic’s ( you need staff to cast/autocast )

100% Lunar magic’s

Anti Flood System

87% Fletching

60% Slayer

Multi barrage

Auto casting

Friends list saving

Statius hammer with special

Zuriel’s Staff

Inferno Adze

multi barrage

wonderful staff

vps

full skulling, skulls show fully with prayer too, with my v6 client

full following - right click & attacking.

Melee hits, hit when the emote hits the player.

Blocking animations added.

Full vengeance.

Almost all special attack’s, including the dark bow

Full defence & attack bonuses, against melee ranged, and magic.

Full magic spells on npc’s, only half have been added on players.

Full wilderness levels, working with magic too.

Full smite.

Full prayer.

Full void ranged increases ranged hits, full void melee increases melee hits.

Full potions working, with level decreasing.

Vengeance recoils almost perfectly.

altars now restore prayer and have been spawned around the server.

Lever pking added.

Full multi zones

thieving added to stalls for a different way of getting money

anti-crash system added

object training

skill buttons teleportation

purple sweets

Pictures



















THERE U GO LOOL thas ma server

Read full topic

This is my first server and i think i did a pretty good job on it considering it’s a 508.

MY goal for this project is to make a good all around server.
